question: In April of 1977, who was the Prime Minister of the first place mentioned by name in the Book of Esther (in the New International Version)?

trajectory.question: In April of 1977, who was the Prime Minister of the first place mentioned by name in the Book of Esther (in the New International Version)?

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
The first place named in Esther in the New International Version is India (Esther 1:1: “from India to Cush”), and in April 1977 the Prime Minister of India was Morarji Desai.

FINAL ANSWER: Morarji Desai

messages.content: In April of 1977, who was the Prime Minister of the first place mentioned by name in the Book of Esther (in the New International Version)?

The first place named in Esther in the New International Version is India (Esther 1:1: “from India to Cush”), and in April 1977 the Prime Minister of India was Morarji Desai.

FINAL ANSWER: Morarji Desai
